title: "Artificial Intelligence Breaks Down Traffic at 20 Crossroads in Jakarta"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence allows the duration of traffic lights to be adjusted on 20 Jakarta streets according to the density of vehicles. Traffic lights are set to automatically prioritize roads that are packed with vehicles."
